feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: The idea of raising Bitcoin block size has been around for a while and was first proposed in March 2013. It received the most votes. However, it seems that the idea was ignored as the "ship left" while ignoring arguments. Tamas Blummer, the Founder and CEO of Bits of Proof, recalled this last time on a list and provided a link to support his claim.
